sect2.title: Introduction to Vorbis Tools
sect2.para: The Vorbis Tools package contains command-line tools for Ogg audio files. This is useful for encoding, playing or editing files using the Ogg CODEC.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Vorbis Tools package contains oggdec, oggenc, ogg123 (requires ), vcut and vorbiscomment.

sect3.title: oggdec
sect3.para: oggdec is a simple decoder which converts Ogg Vorbis files into PCM audio files (WAV or raw).

sect3.title: oggenc
sect3.para: oggenc is the encoder that turns raw, WAV or AIFF files into an Ogg Vorbis stream.

sect3.title: ogg123
sect3.para: ogg123 is a command-line audio player for Ogg Vorbis streams.

sect3.title: ogginfo
sect3.para: ogginfo prints information stored in the audio file.

sect3.title: vcut
sect3.para: vcut will split a file into two files at a designated cut point.

sect3.title: vorbiscomment
sect3.para: vorbiscomment is an editor that changes information in the audio file metadata tags.
